name: The Void Rolls Back
summary: It's the end of the world again. The void has taken over everything, and is causing entropy in all 6 regions. However, you and your companions know the drill by now. Armed with powerful reality-altering dice, you set out on a journey to restore the lands, and hopefully beat the end of times again. To win, you must reach the edge of the world and defeat the horror which lurks there.
